name: Amiel Malay
text: Initially, the author even claimed that this book is unfilmable, as large portions of the novel happen inside Ender's head.  By merging it with Ender's Shadow, Ender's Game became a buddy movie (Ender and Bean).

source_obj.text: Initially, the author even claimed that this book is unfilmable, as large portions of the novel happen inside Ender's head.  By merging it with Ender's Shadow, Ender's Game became a buddy movie (Ender and Bean).
